title: INSIGHT: Robots hit slopes in South Korea
text:
INSIGHT: Robots hit slopes in South Korea 5:35pm IST - 00:53 
While many Alpine events at the Pyeongchang Winter Olympics struggle against high winds there were no such problems for a group of robots which took to the slopes in nearby Dunnae on Monday. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
While many Alpine events at the Pyeongchang Winter Olympics struggle against high winds there were no such problems for a group of robots which took to the slopes in nearby Dunnae on Monday.
